Usually, you don't need to clean the cache, because the cache size of this program
will not exceed 50MB, and it will be automatically cleaned every day, so there is no need to clean it manually.

The default document file is missing in the software directory, so the "Document" function will be disabled.
Fix method: This may be a recompiled version, please find the source program's docs directory, use a tool to create a chm document, and put it in the software res\docs directory.
lang_package.5a:
The {0} language document file is missing in the software directory, so the "Document" function will display English documents.
Fix method: This may be a third-party language package, you need to remake the html version of the document for this language package.

lang_package.3e:
通常情况下，你不需要清理缓存，因为本程序的缓存大小不会超过50MB，并且每天
会自动清理，所以不需要手动清理。
